Ride Share

This app can be used to request and offer rides. Open the nav drawer to view the navigation menu. You will be able to invoke the app\'s functions. You will be able to access the following screens:

Current Requests
Here, you will be able to see all current ride requests.

Current Offers
Here you will be able to see all current ride offers.

Request Ride
Here you will be able to request a ride.

Post Offer
Here you will be able to post a ride offer.

Close app
The app will be closed.

Home
Shows the users points.

Get help
Useful help information about the app will be displayed.
